A cheat for MR3!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Hoaxes, Myths & Pranks: A cheat for MR3!
By Djinnmastr on Sunday, November 4, 2001 - 10:26 am:

Ok, according to gamesages.com

"After selecting the type of training (for example, trampoline in Morx Forest), rapidly press X. Your monster will perform the training process by itself, and most of the time will win if it is healthy."

Wow, the monsters are able to train on their own! And they may succeed if healthy! If it wasn't for this code, the monsters would be forced to train on their own, and they may not succeed, even with healthyf. :::cough cough SARCASM cough cough:::

By Crystal Pixie on Sunday, November 4, 2001 - 11:45 am:

Yeah, I saw that cheat. i don't believe it though.

By DigMoshMogi on Sunday, November 4, 2001 - 12:33 pm:

lol I tried it on a turbo controller just because and monsters failed just as much.

By Nate Railsback on Sunday, November 4, 2001 - 12:35 pm:

I thought it was just a superstition, then I realized it was a flat-out lie. If you hit the X button once, it will skip through the animation sequence for the training and deposit you straight at the results. Therefore, hitting it repeatedly between the start of the training and the results would be impossible. Maybe if they'd said the O or square button, they would have gotten away with it.
